member.name: T:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.BufferFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating an instance of IBuffer from an ILockableMemory.

member.name: M:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.BufferFactory.CreateBuffer(Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ILockableMemory)
member.summary: Create an IBuffer from an ILockableMemory.
member.param: A pointer to the data to wrap in an IBuffer.
member.returns: An IBuffer pointing to the same data as bufferPointer

member.name: T:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ILockableMemory
member.summary: A buffer represented by a pointer to a memory location and a length. Implementations can be used to create IBuffer objects using a BufferFactory.

member.name: M:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ILockableMemory.Lock
member.summary: Lock the buffer for pointer access.

member.name: M:Nokia.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.ILockableMemory.Unlock
member.summary: Unlock the buffer for pointer access, invalidating the previously returned raw pointer.
